fullplot: It is the 80's, and fourteen year-old Filipa is spending her vacation at Bèzios with her father, Mathias, her alcoholic mother, Clarice, and her two younger siblings in their beach house. When Filipa feels that the relationship of her parents is deteriorating, she snoops in her father's office. There she finds pictures of Mathias with his American lover èngela hidden in a drawer of his desk. When Mathias and Clarice announce to their children that they are not going to live together for a period, the confused Filipa believes that èngela is the responsible for the separation of her parents and discovers that the marriage of Mathias and Clarice is built on a bed of lies.
plot: A 1980s-set drama about a teenage girl undergoing her sexual awakening when she learns about her father's infidelities.
title: Adrift
